P.HT: Form for reporting administrative penalties or measures disclosed to the public

IMG.CNT.P: The acronym of the Union legislative act under which the administrative penalty or measure has been imposed.
The acronym of the Member State of the competent authority submitting the administrative penalty or measure
The identification code used to uniquely identify a legal entity on which an administrative penalty or measure has been imposed.
The identifier of the competent authority submitting the administrative penalty or measure
The acronym of the Union legislative act that applies to the entity on which the administrative penalty or measure has been imposed.
Full name of the entity on which the administrative penalty or measure has been imposed
Full name of the persons on whom an administrative penalty or measure has been imposed.
The acronym of the competent authority that has imposed the administrative penalty or measure.
Text of the administrative penalty or measure in the main language
Text of the administrative penalty or measure in other language (*)
The date on which the administrative penalty or measure was imposed by the competent authority
Date on which the administrative penalty or measure ends
(*) Other language could be either a language customary in the sphere of international finance or another official language of the Member State.
